title: Breaking point
creator_credit: Brian McDuffie, Justin Milne, South Australian Film Corporation and Newfilms
brief_description: Looks at mental breakdown and the treatment of mental disorders by presenting a dramatisation of 2 case studies : a young girl suffering from schizophrenia and a middle aged man who is depressive. Cast includes Marcia Deane-Johns, Leo Taylor, Barbara West, Wayne Bell, Shane Withington.
